attributes.action: Give everyone a day off work or school for their birthday.
attributes.additional_details: A day off would improve wellbeing, morale, and work-life balance. It would also ensure celebrated individuality.
attributes.background: People should be able to celebrate their birthday without having to take annual leave. Requesting a guaranteed day off.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/724372
